name: Mylyn ODA Data Source
tagline: An ODA Driver for Using Mylyn Tasks as ODA Data Source. Very useful for using Mylyn tasks and data as data source for BIRT reporting
body:
### Install Mylyn ODA Data Source
Point the following URL to your eclipse update site manager to install the Mylyn ODA Data Source:

Eclipse 4.3 (Kepler):
```
http://gzunino.github.io/mylyn-oda-datasource/p2/kepler
```

### Authors and Contributors
Mylyn ODA Driver is a set of Eclipse plugins created by Guillermo Zunino (@gzunino), guillez@gmail.com

### Support or Contact
Contact guillez@gmail.com.
